## Implement

- One floating panel anchored in front of user.
- Buttons: `Voice`, `Type`, `Submit`, `Clear`, `Return Home`.
- Status line: `Listening`, `Planning`, `Building`, `Ready`, `Error`.

## Done when

- User can complete the whole loop using the panel only.
